content: {"name": "East Balto. Church of God", "alternate_name": "", "description": "FOOD PANTRY: Offers a grocery shopping experience based on a point system. Each household receives points based on a tier and the number of household members. Services are available once every 30 days. Provides one box of food to last one week for those who do not have qualifying documentation. Offers Thanksgiving assistance for existing clients only.Note: Call 410-285-4674 or visit the Facebook page for up-to-date information regarding inclement weather delays or closings before traveling to the Community Choice Pantry.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.charmcitychurchofgod.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "800 Oldham Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Greektown", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21224", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.2837837, "longitude": -76.555604}, "phones": [{"number": "(443) 835-1375", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}]}
